structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Mapping project account -- Transfer of funds.

text.section: The Department of Revenue is authorized to establish an account entitled the "mapping project account" which is a fund created within the restricted fund group set forth in KRS 45.305. The purpose of this account is to provide funds for the mapping project as set forth in KRS 132.670. This account shall not lapse.
There is hereby authorized to be deposited into this account the balance of the money heretofore deposited in the "Kentucky Wastewater Revolving Fund" created pursuant to KRS 107.600, now repealed.
The commissioner of revenue or any person duly authorized by him shall have the authority to withdraw from this account for the purpose set forth in subsection (1) of this section.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 218, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 74, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, F, 7, (1) at 641.
